attributes.action: give the British people the opportunity to elect their Prime Minister by holding a general election in 2008 and to stamp out the culture of sleeze and corruption
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British people have not had the opportunity to elect this current Prime Minister who presides over us with the same culture of sleeze and corruption in his government as the last incumbent of number 10 Downing Street. The people deserve to have a vote, and this current government should seek a mandate from the electorate to govern - a general election should be held in 2008.
Any MP or Minister from any political party found to be in contempt of his/her office by corruption should be sacked forthwith.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
